name: Cowcoin
description: COW.CM VPN the industry's first decentralized VPN application, combines blockchain technology and Cowcoin (COW) token incentives to provide privacy protection and network acceleration services. Users can earn tokens through referral rewards and participation mechanisms, increasing activity and loyalty, and quickly achieving user growth to create a million-user ecosystem. Cowcoin is a utility token with innovative mechanisms and multiple burn designs to ensure continuous value growth. Its decentralized nature ensures fairness and transparency, avoiding risks from private and seed sales. The liquidity design and LP locking mechanism ensure a long-term stable market.
